about_the_game:
Swinario super bros. This is an arcade game for everyone who loves adventure and good music ! It all started with the fact that the pig went to the toilet and was sucked into the sewer ! Your task is to get out into the light and get on TV… Cheerful tracks from Dj will help you to go all the way from the beginning to the end. Lebedeff and colorful graphics with luxurious animation. The game has toilet races, a mammoth journey through Sibira and unique bosses at each level.

Level 1. Sewage system
It is necessary to go through the sewers and eliminate the boss

Level 2. Barcelona
Here you will have to swim and jump through many difficult obstacles and swim in extreme conditions. In the end, you will have to save the mammoth Alexey.

Level 3. Siberia
You need to pass the harsh tests of Siberia to get a Bentley.

Level 4. Saint-Petersburg
The level where you will have a battle with the acrobat brothers.

Level 5. Moscow
You need to get to Ostankino, which is guarded by Dr. Evil.

Level 6. Ostankino
You get into the studio of the program Live great where you will have a battle with the main boss and a deadly rally on the toilets.

content_descriptors.notes:
• The game contains Russian obscene language
• Drug use hints
• Nude on the screensaver of the game
• Some enemies die to kill with blood and meat

detailed_description:
Swinario super bros. This is an arcade game for everyone who loves adventure and good music ! It all started with the fact that the pig went to the toilet and was sucked into the sewer ! Your task is to get out into the light and get on TV… Cheerful tracks from Dj will help you to go all the way from the beginning to the end. Lebedeff and colorful graphics with luxurious animation. The game has toilet races, a mammoth journey through Sibira and unique bosses at each level.

Level 1. Sewage system
It is necessary to go through the sewers and eliminate the boss

Level 2. Barcelona
Here you will have to swim and jump through many difficult obstacles and swim in extreme conditions. In the end, you will have to save the mammoth Alexey.

Level 3. Siberia

name: Swinario Super Bros. Play

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Xp, 7, 10
  • Processor: Celeron+
  • Graphics: HD gaming graphics card
  • Storage: 320 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Xp, 7, 10
  • Processor: i7
  • Graphics: HD gaming graphics card
  • Storage: 320 MB available space

short_description: A chilling story with elements of pork broth! Complete all the levels and destroy all the bosses to get on TV.
